description: Leading development team in creating innovative serious games for cybersecurity awareness training
Architecting and implementing multi-platform game solutions (Web, VR, Kinect) using Unity and modern web technologies
Mentoring junior developers and establishing coding standards and best practices for the team
Collaborating with security experts to translate complex cybersecurity concepts into engaging game mechanics
Managing full development lifecycle from concept to deployment for enterprise clients
Instructed students in core game development subjects including C/C++, design patterns, and Unity3D engine
Developed comprehensive curriculum for HTML5 game development and optimization techniques
Guided students through hands-on projects and graduation projects in VR and traditional game development
Provided mentorship on industry-standard tools including version control (Git) and collaborative workflows
Successfully migrated legacy Flash games to modern cross-platform solutions (Web, Android, iOS) using Unity3D and Phaser.js
Developed robust server-side architecture for real-time multiplayer card and board games using Java and SmartFox Server
Implemented responsive game UI/UX designs ensuring consistent experience across all platforms
Optimized game performance and reduced loading times by 40% through code optimization and asset management
